### IConsole.IsEnabledSwapScreen property
</br>


#### Gets a value indicating whether screen swapping is supported.

```csharp
public bool IsEnabledSwapScreen { get; }
```

### Property Value

`true` if buffer swapping is enabled; otherwise `false`.
